item.title: Contact Colloquium series will start soon
item.description:
The ICRN will start a monthly Contact Colloquium from the 18th of October, where we will hear from leading researchers on intergroup contact and related fields and get a chance to discuss with them. The sessions are open to all; the schedule and registration links are now available here.

Read more
